Blog.post: was reading other peoples blogs today, when i looked at Kawins, i found that i was in it. wow. i am rarely ever in anyone elses blog other than keri's. i feel special now. of course i feel special too when im in keri's blog. i actually practiced today! woohoo, good for me. it was fun too. imagine that! proves that new song is very flapping in my opinion. in other news: life still v. flap other than friends lately charlie has been on my nerves he better shape up cabe

life is not flapping at all. proves to be more flap day by day. the only thing flapping in my life is friends. parents suck. school is alright but still sucks. life outside school other than weekends boring and it sucks. at least i still have my friends.

yesterday was fun. i went on a road trip(sort of) with my dad to go get my sister from college, and her friend too. the first 5 hours were so boring. we got there and took some pictures got whits stuff and went to go get D and her stuff. on the way home it was boring for the first hour or so till i got in the back with whit and D. we played on my sisters computer for a while till we got to a McDicks. then we ate. after that we started writing this story on her computer. its a game where u pass the story around and someone adds something like half a sentence untill someone ends the story. anyway. we got bored of that after awhile and started saying tounge twisters and i suck at those so i just played on my sisters computer. then we all started singing acopella songs till we got thome. cabe

Flapping time with keri tonight. did lots of stuff. she came over. we went out on my roof for a while. then went down to my Footon swing and looked at the senery and talked for a while. then we went and ate dinner and talked for a while with my parents about lotr and hp. then we watched a movie which was flapping, October Sky(watch it). then sadly she had to go home and i had to do the dishes ALL ALONE. im just jokin keri. cabe

day was as usual boreing. did i spell that right? oh well. flap day wish i could have seen keri more. went to look for her ALL over school. though should have looked in spot where she usually gets picked up by her mom. Flap.i find myself using the words flapping and flap more often now more than ever. unusual for me. well thats all fer now. miss kiwi. cabe
Best Feeling in the World: Knowing that she loves me back.

had another boring day. till i got home and got on the internet. jen got a new deadaim and decided to mess with my head. fun fun. for them. -sigh- anyway fun while it lasted. still miss keri terribly. i get to see her today though. im happy. i changed my blog colors. tell me what u think. v. excited that i can change my blog that much. hehe.so anyway i forgive u jen and keri but please use someone else next time. v. flumoxed now. cabe
today....boring. have nothing to do.miss kiwi. cabe

y does life suck sooo much?i came in to the kennel that day and she looked at me and i knew something was wrong. she just looked at me with tose eyes. i don't remember exactly what she said but she broke it off again. after a whole $&#*ing year. she calls it off for good. u couldn't imagine what it did to me. hell. pure hell. then it was mitch.oh mitch. u sutpid bastard. thats the real reason she dumped me. well that what i would like to think.no it was actually me. my stupid boyish hormones. its one of those times where u wish u could go back in time and tell urself "don't do that". hell, pure hell. god what i would give to get her back.almost anything. shes a rare thing in this world and i lost her. im a $&#*ing ididot.
i was goin to try and say this in a cute little poem. but i'm not good at those. Be Happy. don't try to make me happy.

god. somedays u think every other word out of my mouth is an insult directed twards u.Its NOT. i would never insult u on purpose. sometimes what comes out of my mouth isn't what i'm thinking. if it comes across offensive, im sorry, im not good with words.im sorry.

i'm pathetic.this whole thing is pathetic. but y does it stay. y do i have such strong feelings for u. i see u wiht mitch and my whole view bursts into a white hot flame. i can't see anyhting but u too, together, teasing each other like we didn't do. i screwed up i know. u don't think i could have done anything to prevent this? bullshit ur just want me get over u. i could have done something to prevent it and i should have, but i didn't. but y didn't i. it was my first time.i didn't know what the hell i was doin. screw it. i guess its over for u. but its not for me.i'll keep tryin till it kills me.
You have no idea how i feel.
how can i say to her that i still love her and want her. that she means more than life itself. and not expirience the let down that comes so soon after. i guess i can't.
y do i still feel this way. it rips me up inside everytime i think of it, of her. y can't i just let her go. can't i move on. its not what i want but its what needs to happen. she has i haven't.
WOOHOO!!life sucks again.
i need to read that book...

So, its tuesday and i haven't talked about Hershey yet. What the hell is wrong sith me? Hershey kicked ass. Hershey makes up for the lack of number of coasters with the heart stopping speed and hieght of the coasters. It was awsome. waiting in line with my best friends for an hour and a half for a 45 second ride...is the best thing u could do with a saturday. Other than a movie day with the gang at rachels. Brought 15 bucks and came home with 4.50 and an empty stomach. Nothin like a day at Hershey park. Oh and that was the worse we have ever played devil. What are we doin, gettin suckyer rather than betterer?

Why do I burn and pine for her? Why can't I get over this girl? Why do I love her more than anything else in the world? Can some one tell me this or at least tell me how to get over her. Seriously, I want to know because I can't do it. Its so hard to be just her friend. I can't help but want to be alone with her whenever I see her.

RAIN. A word as simple as that, can give such an image. Of love, in the rain. I can see a boy and a girl, standing. It begins to rain. The girl looks up from his embrace and smiles. Forhead wet with rain, and those beautiful eyes so full of emotion, they close o' so slowly. And he kisses her in the most intimate expression of love. The feeling just radiating off of the two. The kiss ends the same as it began but eyes open instead of close. Still looking at him she bites her lip in the most enticing way possible. Another embrace. Forever love as I want it for me.

I want to live in the country again, surounded by woods all around. I want to wake up in the middle of a summers night, lay on my deck and watch the stars. I want to hear the birds all day and fall asleep to the sound of a chorus of insects chirping into the night. I want to be closer to her. I want to be away from it all. School, the city, working, and just enjoy it. I want to feel the warm rain on my face as i lay in the grass. I want to live as if i have not a care in the world. But don't we all?

It really does feel like ive had a large knive slowly shoved into my heart, but quikly. Its like a jab. A heart stopping moment, when u realize how much life sucks. How much u loved and still love her. But its someone elses hand shes holding. She never did that with u. She never liked that sort of thing when u were with her. I saw it and ignored it best i could. Best i could. Its like having a lead wieght strapped around your heart like a cold , rusty chain; digging in everytime you move.

I feel like shit. I've been thinking about how keri treats her friends and im really questioning whether she a good one or not. I've takin so much shit from her over the two years i've been well aquainted to her. We claim to be best friends but really how are u supposed to be friends with someone who blows you off all the time. I should call her sometime i know. Everytime she asks me to walk with her upstairs carl or josh comes along and im left in the dust. But on the other side, how exciting am i? not very. Im about the most boring person i know. I son't do anything, i hate the thought of having responsibility, im not very active, i don't ever have anything worth talking about and the list goes on. All i like really is science and math and im not even that fuckin good at either. I claim to be an electronics geek but really i can't do anything with that shit. I admit that i know more than the average joe but not much more. I wait for things to happen to me and blame everyone else when nothing comes to me. One word to describe me: LOSER.

Shes so beautiful. Most of the time Ican't take my eyes off of her. I love it when her hair is all a mess. I love her eyes, though dark they light up my world. Her ears look completely differernt and unequal, thats the way she likes things. She doesn't like it when things are "even". Her rosy, cute nose. Her teeth, always clean, unlike mine. Shes just so cute. I love how she writes though she doesn't give me much to read. I wish I could see some of her most recent works though she'll never let me. I love her art work too. The way she just doodles swirling and swaying lines. It just looks so easy for her. I still have the tiger on my fridge, signed with love. She belittles her talents so much. And so do I. But i don't mean to. Im a horrible critic and Im always looking for something to make better. I criticized one of her works last year and she got really pissed off. No matter how many times I say Im sorry, she'll never forgive me for saying it. It was a stupid comment and I wish for all the world if I could take it back, but i can't. It'll always be there in the back of her mind and mine the way I insulted her art. I just wish so much to change the many stupid things I've said to her in ignorance. I love how she loves the rain. I love it when we're outside and its raining and her hair is wet and messy and shes soaked to the bone, but shes still standing there, in front of me and I kiss her, in the rain. I wish I had been more romantic instead of the raging hormones boy. Man, I never saw her before it was too late. I was trapped, entranced by her...everything.

I love her. Ands its not just the love between friends. I still love her as I did when we were together. But thats not enough. I know so much about her that most people don't. It feels like i know her too well to be just friends, but thats what she wants. I know what was wrong and I caught on too late. She says its no ones fault, but I know, it was mine. I guess we didn't do much. At least we didn't do too many different things. I just wish I had another chance, but its too late for that. Way too late.

You know sometimes i wish i hadn't even been born into this family. Sometimes. I love them all, but when we're all together its chaos. At least between my parents. They divorced when i was five, then got remarried about eight years ago then divorced AGAIN a year ago. And all the while quiet little caleb stands by idly and watches it all in perfect detail. I was so tired of the fights. Always fighting, yelling, crying, screaming. My sister, whitney 18 years old now, and i used to huddle up in her room to comfort each other. There were holes in doors and other broken things along with our spirits. Josh, now 23, was lucky he only had to deal with one divorce at least living through it. Im 16 now and i don't show it, but it hurts. Its always there in the back of my mind. Sometimed i just want to cry, but i realize its uslessness. I love my family very much, but when my parents get together its not fun.
Hey, i've got a new blog. I can vent, rant and rave now.

is wrong with me

Its funny the way feelings go. And how you don't really know what the hell your feeling half the time. At least I don't. I've had these feelings and still have no idea what they mean. Like, Love, and why I feel this way. And how do we express these feelings, thought inexplicable, to the person your feeling them towards? Especially if that person already has someone that they "feel" about or rather have "feelings" towards. Its a tough question. Though a tough question for me may be a very easy one for some one else, but I won't get into that. I come across this almost every day. And someone finally caught it. But I still can't say it. Its pointless. I wouldn't want to jeopardize the friendship for something that might not even be there. I've decided against it.

i still love her, still can't get her out of my mind, shes still there with those eyes and her cute little nose and her smile and smarts and everything damn life is a bitch and now i sorta like rachel, though i should probably keep us as friends if she wants us to be dating ill let her inquire i think she knows i like her, hopefully keri rachel neither one likes me so what the hell am i after them both for i think i have a condition shit
